What they don't tell you: The downsides of installing a big brake kitHave you considered these 5 things before installing a BBK?ğŸ‘‰ğŸ» React with ğŸ‘ğŸ» if you have!ğŸ‘‰ğŸ» React with ğŸ˜ if you must have your BBK no matter what!â¡ï¸Read ithere!

Most important thing about have bbk  is tyres. Tyres are the only point of contact from the road to the car. No point having BBK but bald tyres. I would rather invest in a good set of performance tyres.Also  i feel like most cars in SG have BBK for aesthetic. BBK doesnt decrease the stopping distance but instead creates a more consistent braking distance over a long period of time. Honestly if you are not going to track of go up and down 99 like a lunatic  i dont think you need BBK

Also  BBK voids AD warranty. There are many shitty BBK in the market that claims to be "AP Racing" or "Brembo". Yeah so if anybody is considering BBK  do make sure its authentic. Pretty sure no one wants a brake failure on the expressway with a jam ahead
